batFightWords
----------------------------

85 fantastic words for when you need a colletion of nonsense.

Courtesy of [Bat Mania](http://www.bat-mania.co.uk/trivia/batfight_words.php)

Downloaded 10/02/2015

```{r batFightWords}
batFightWords <- as.vector(read.csv(file = "data/batFightWords.csv", header=FALSE, stringsAsFactors=FALSE)[,1])
```
